<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>This script will run once on upgrade. 
Create icons for existing records in sys_cs_branding_setup. Icons are introduced as a part of Tokyo. 
This fix script is to create icons for existing records when upgraded from SD.</description>
        <name>Create icons for existing Menu Items</name>
        <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var brandingGR = new GlideRecord("sys_cs_branding_setup");
brandingGR.addActiveQuery();
brandingGR.query();
while (brandingGR.next()) {
    var menuItemGR = new GlideRecord("va_branding_contact_menu");
    menuItemGR.addQuery("type", "Icon");
    menuItemGR.addQuery("branding", brandingGR.getValue("sys_id"));
    menuItemGR.query();
    if (!menuItemGR.next()) {
        gs.info("Create icons for existing Menu Item: " + brandingGR.getValue("sys_name"));
        var utils = new ContactMenuUtils(brandingGR);
        utils.insertIconMenuItem();
    }
}
gs.info("Successfully executed Fix Script for 'Create icons for existing Menu Items'");]]></script>
